definition: abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: (bird species of China) large-billed crow (Corvus macrorhynchos)
(bird species of China) carrion crow (Corvus corone)
crow's beak/(fig.) person who makes an inauspicious remark

sentences.english: The Crow set up a loud caw and dropped the flesh.
sentences.chinese: 乌鸦张嘴大叫了一声，把肉掉了。

sentences.english: The wings of a crow can never cover up the sun.
sentences.chinese: 乌鸦的翅膀遮不住太阳。

sentences.english: My raven never reached him, elsewise he would have come.
sentences.chinese: 我的乌鸦一定是没到他那里，不然他一定会回来的。

sentences.english: The crow thinks his own bird fairest.
sentences.chinese: 乌鸦总以为自己的雏鸟最美。

sentences.english: A flock of cawing ravens had just flown up from in front of her.
sentences.chinese: 一群呱呱鸣叫的乌鸦从她面前飞起。

sentences.english: He took a breath to clear away the cobwebs of the night as the raven flapped away.
sentences.chinese: 他吸了口气吹走昨夜的蜘蛛网，乌鸦随之扑翅飞开。

sentences.english: The crows dived on the owl .
No more of the Crows Crying at Night.
sentences.chinese: 再也听不到黑夜里乌鸦的啼鸣。

sentences.english: Beyond the crows' treetops are banks of clouds.
sentences.chinese: 在乌鸦树梢的那一边是堆乌云。

sentences.english: The "Crows Nest" has screened venting to provide additional ventilation.
sentences.chinese: 在“乌鸦巢”的甄别，以提供额外的排气通风。

sentences.english: The drowsy browser knits its brows to browbeat the frowzy crow.
sentences.chinese: 昏昏欲睡的吃草动物皱眉头恐吓邋遢的乌鸦。

sentences.english: You do occasionally find a carrion crow among the eagles.
sentences.chinese: 偶尔在鹰群中，你会发现一只吃腐肉的小嘴乌鸦。

sentences.english: Carrion crows bewail the dead sheep and then eat them.
sentences.chinese: 乌鸦吃死羊，先要哭一场。

sentences.english: ACROW perishing with thirst saw a pitcher, and hoping to find water, flew to it with great delight.
sentences.chinese: 一天，当乌鸦觉得口很渴的时候，忽然发现一个水壶。

sentences.english: And ever since then, Raven has had a curved beak.
sentences.chinese: 从那以后啊，所有的乌鸦都有了一张弯曲的嘴。

definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
vulture/(bird species of China) cinereous vulture (Aegypius monachus)
vulture/(bird species of China) griffon vulture (Gyps fulvus)
